name: Box Ninja GO!
description:
Welcome to the dojo, ninja. Your objective: chop the most boxes you can! What better way to do that than playing Box Ninja GO!, The original hit box-slicing mobile game?

Unsheathe your blade and start the paper carnage that so many players have come to know and love. Experience the thrill of setting a new high score in this arcade mode game.

Prove to your friends and family that you’re the top ninja around. Show them how much you can cut by comparing your score with your friends to rise through the ranks and reach the top of the leaderboard!

What are you waiting for? Whether you're playing for some mindless fun and trying to relax and pass the time, or trying to improve your skills as a master ninja, this is the game for you. Enjoy the awesomeness and believe the hype of Box Ninja Go!
